Sure! Here are some news sources that focus on UK politics and offer a progressive perspective:

- The Guardian: A daily British newspaper known for its progressive editorial stance. It provides coverage of UK politics, world news, and social issues from a liberal point of view. It also has a section dedicated to climate change news.
- The New Statesman: A weekly British magazine that offers analysis and commentary on politics, economics, social justice, and culture from a progressive perspective.
- Novara Media: A UK-based independent media organization that provides progressive analysis of UK politics and social issues. They also cover international news, and their content includes podcasts, videos, and written analysis.
- Open Democracy: A UK-based media organization that offers progressive perspectives on global politics, democracy, and social justice issues. Their content includes news, investigations, analyses, and opinions.

Remember to also stay critical and compare different news sources to get a more comprehensive understanding of the issues.
